law.catch_line: The Board may issue a retired status license to an individual who:...

section.section: The holder of a retired status license issued under this section may not engage in the practice of professional land surveying or property line surveying.
The holder of a professional land surveyor retired status license may use the designation of "retired professional land surveyor".
The holder of a property line surveyor retired status license may use the designation of "retired property line surveyor".
